verses.verse: Then the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3027>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H5892>cities<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in,<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for our <S%H929>livestock.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

The <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who were of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> had <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

The <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> had <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> had <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> had <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name:<s%>

and they were for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> who were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> for theirs was the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7151>Kiriath<s%> <S%H704>Arba,<s%> named after the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

But they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

To the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H3492>Jattir<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H2473>Holon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>

<S%H5871>Ain<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H3194>Juttah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> out of those <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H5960>Almon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> had the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H6911>Kibzaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H514>Elteke<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H357>Aijalon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> Gath <S%H1667>Rimmon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

Out of <S%H4276>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and Gath <S%H1667>Rimmon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

They gave to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> out of <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> and Be <S%H1203>Eshterah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H7191>Kishion<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H1705>Daberath<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> En <S%H5873>Gannim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H4861>Mishal<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H2520>Helkath<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> <S%H2576>Hammothdor<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H7178>Kartan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

To the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H7177>Kartah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H1829>Dimnah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
Out of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> with its <S%H3096>suburbs,<s%> Jahaz with its suburbs,
<S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> with its <S%H4158>suburbs,<s%> and Mephaath with its <S%H702>suburbs;<s%> four <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

Out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H7433>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> cities in <S%H5892>all.<s%>

All these were the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> even the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> Their <S%H1486>lot<s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H272>midst<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>
<S%H5892>Each<s%> of these <S%H5892>cities<s%> included their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5892>them.<s%> It was this way with all these cities.

So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%> They <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3427>it,<s%> and lived in it.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave them <S%H5117>rest<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> according to all that he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%> Not a <S%H376>man<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>them.<s%> Yahweh <S%H5414>delivered<s%> all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Nothing <S%H5307>failed<s%> of <S%H1697>any<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> All came to <S%H935>pass.<s%>
